name: Memory Lane (itch) (Durhnevir)
description:
An artist seeking new ideas, loses himself in his introspection. He explores his mind as his own spiritual representation, in search of “fragments”, bribes of memories, experiences or inspirations.

The player embodies this spiritual representation during the artist’s different phases of ideation. He will have to travel dream lands and find enough fragments in order to forge a powerful idea.  To move from isle to isle, he will must to solve puzzles involving the camera.

 As the artist progresses in his life, ideation phases will be longer and the dream land bigger, but the player will be able to use more powerful powers.

Take your trip down Memory Lane !

Game created in 6 weeks, by a team of 9 students, during their first year in Brassart School Lyon.

- 5 3D artists

Tristan POULENARD

Eliott LARGE

Clara MARTINS DA SILVA

Marilyse HOCHARD

Lilian CHOKOUALE DATOU

- 1 Programmer

Hugo PICOLO

- 3 Game and Level designers

Oscar BERRY

Lucas VERPILLAT

Yannick LE DUFF
